testimonial: Little trees and bushes grow however makes them happy. Isn't that fantastic that you can make whole mountains in minutes?
name: Bob Ross

testimonial: Work on one thing at a time. Don't get carried away - we have plenty of time. It's amazing what you can do with a little love in your heart.
name: Bob Ross

testimonial: Put light against light - you have nothing. Put dark against dark - you have nothing. It's the contrast of light and dark that each give the other one meaning.
name: Bob Ross
